answers.author: Pooja Varma
answers.text:
Hi Kelly, 
I found a few examples of polices from various jurisdictions that should prove useful.

City of Artesia, California Policy for Issuance of proclamations provides their consideration process for proclamations, and other recognitions. http://www.cityofartesia.us/PolicyforIssuanceofProclamations.html 
City of Tallahassee, Florida Ceremonial Recognition Policy provides the scope and applicability, for proclamations, plaques and certificates of appreciation and Large and Small Keys to the city. http://www.talgov.com/commission/policies/114.cfm 
City of Calgary, Canada proclamation policy provides requirements and procedure.
http://www.calgary.ca/docgallery/bu/cityclerks/council_policies/cc015.pdf 

And two examples of Issuance of Proclamation request forms:
-   Seattle, WA Guidelines and Request Form http://www.mrsc.org/PolicyProcedures/S42ProcGuide.pdf
-   City of Fresno, CA online request form
http://www.fresno.gov/Government/CityClerk/Forms/RequestIssuanceProclaimation.htm
I hope this is useful,
Pooja Varma 
International City/County Management Association
Knowledge Network Intern
pvarma@icma.org

author: Kelly Kresser
text:
Does your community have a policy governing:
1) issuance of keys to the city, and;
2) issuance of proclamations
If so, is it possible to see the content of your policy so that we can begin to develop one?
title: Policy for issuing keys to the city and proclamations
